backend/main.mo: Defines core competition, user, event, payment, and result types plus comparison logic for sorting events; includes migration hook and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a no-op migration that returns the existing competition ID state.
feature_evidence.json: Documents feature evidence linking a specific solve-flow refresh feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their structure and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/public/env.json: Stores the backend canister ID used by the frontend.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Provides Razorpay payment configuration including key, currency, and UI theme.
frontend/REGRESSION_SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST: Provides a step-by-step regression checklist covering authentication, admin access, competitions, leaderboards, and admin user flows.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Maps various backend error messages to short user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines react-query cache keys and key generators for competitions, profiles, results, admin data, and solve sessions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Router, query client, theme provider, and all application routes including public, profile, solve flow, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: Provides a UI to configure competition pricing modes and fees, syncing inputs with a FeeMode value.
Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading or access-denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content, showing a login prompt if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Displays a competition summary card with status, dates, and participant info, linking to the competition page.
Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, auth controls, and mobile menu, rendering routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Displays a leaderboard table with ranks, competitor names, Ao5, and solve times, pulling profile data and enabling navigation to user profiles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Shows a user's payment history with sorting, loading states, and details like event, date, amount, and payment ID.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Provides a dropdown user menu showing profile info and options to view the profile or logout.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Renders a dialog to collect email and display name, then creates a new user profile via API mutations.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements a 15‑second inspection timer with optional scramble visibility and callbacks for start and completion.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Displays a completion screen after all solves with navigation options and instructions for submitting video evidence.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Interactive solve timer component that tracks elapsed time, handles start/stop, and reports results upward.
frontend/src/components/system/ActorInit: Displays a connection error with troubleshooting steps and a retry button.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads and caches Razorpay config from a JSON file with a fallback default configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload listener to warn users before leaving when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile via the actor once available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages simulated deployment flow with step tracking, errors, and diagnostic logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and identity loading via a React context.
Blocks browser back navigation with a confirmation prompt when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks and helpers for competitions, payments, profiles, and results using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base styles to elements and the body.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Provides types and logic to calculate average of 5 attempts with DNF handling and penalty rules.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Utility functions to determine if a competition is paid and format or extract fee amounts from fee modes.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Exports competition results to CSV and includes generic CSV generation and download helpers.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable dates and date-times using locale settings.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates a multi-step deployment process with optional failures and normalizes deployment error messages.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for deployment, validating environment files, payment config, connectivity, and build artifacts.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay checkout script and opens a payment modal using config and user/order details.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Manages tab-scoped solve session tokens in sessionStorage with store, retrieve, clear, and existence checks.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds.milliseconds or returns DNF for invalid values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Displays all competitions for admins with actions to delete, lock/unlock, and activate/deactivate each competition.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides a form for admins to create competitions, configure events, scrambles, fees, and metadata, with validation and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Allows admins to edit an existing competition’s details, events, scrambles, fees, and status, preloading existing data for modification.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs and displays deployment preflight checks and deployment progress with diagnostics for going live on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Admin dashboard landing page linking to user, competition, results management, and quick actions like creating competitions or starting deployment.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Admin UI for viewing competition results, filtering by competition and event, toggling result visibility, and exporting results to CSV.
Admin UI for listing users, blocking/unblocking, deleting accounts, resetting competition statuses, and viewing solve histories.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Competition detail and registration page handling event selection, payment flow, and starting or resuming solve sessions.
Displays all competitions grouped by status with loading state and cards for each competition.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows leaderboard for a specific competition and event, computing Ao5 and enabling profile navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Lists all competitions with status badges and navigation to their leaderboards, gated behind authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page allowing editing personal info and viewing payment history.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Public-facing competitor profile showing stats and event‑grouped results with navigation back to leaderboards.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Implements the full solve flow including inspection, timing, session sync, scramble fetching, and result submission for a competition attempt.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Defines admin-specific types such as result input structures, public profile info, and condensed user summaries.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Provides extended local typings mirroring backend models, including competitions, results, leaderboards, profiles, and session state.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event labels, event list, and a default event for display and selection logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theming, colors, animations, and enabling additional plugins.
project_state.json: Snapshot of project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, and feature history for the speedcubing platform.
